title: Bit Load Word Function
description: This function modifies a WORD input based on a specified position and a boolean value. If the boolean value is true, it sets a bit at the given position in the input WORD. If false, it clears that bit instead.
name: BIT_LOAD_W

input.name: IN
input.description: The input WORD to be modified.

input.name: VAL
input.description: Boolean value indicating whether to set or clear the bit.

input.name: POS
input.description: The position of the bit to be set or cleared.

output.name: BIT_LOAD_W
output.description: The modified WORD after the bit operation.

return_value.description: The resulting WORD after the function's bit manipulation.
